ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), /* Allow Admin */ CASE(Stage__c, "New", 1, "Booked", 2, "Agreement", 3, "Demands & Collections", 4, "Registration", 5, "Hand Over", 6, "Swapping", 7, "Cancellation", 8, 0) < CASE(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "New", 1, "Booked", 2, "Agreement", 3, "Demands & Collections", 4, "Registration", 5, "Hand Over", 6, "Swapping", 7, "Cancellation", 8, 0) )
